briefTitle: Trial of PDE4 Inhibition With Roflumilast for the Management of Plaque Psoriasis
officialTitle: A Phase 3, 8-Week, Parallel Group, Double Blind, Vehicle-Controlled Study of the Safety and Efficacy of ARQ-151 Cream 0.3% Administered QD in Subjects With Chronic Plaque Psoriasis
summary: This is a double-blind, parallel group, vehicle-controlled study to assess the safety and efficacy of roflumilast (ARQ-151) 0.3% cream vs vehicle (placebo) cream for treatment of chronic plaque psoriasis (CPP) in adult participants with 2 to 20% body surface area (BSA) of CPP.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Achieving Success in Investigator Global Assessment (IGA) Scale Assessment of Disease Severity at Week 8
